\index{cydui::components::component\_state\_t@{cydui::components::component\_state\_t}!force\_redraw@{force\_redraw}}
\index{force\_redraw@{force\_redraw}!cydui::components::component\_state\_t@{cydui::components::component\_state\_t}}
\doxysubsubsection{\texorpdfstring{force\_redraw()}{force\_redraw()}}
{\footnotesize\ttfamily void cydui\+::components\+::component\+\_\+state\+\_\+t\+::force\+\_\+redraw (\begin{DoxyParamCaption}{ }\end{DoxyParamCaption})\hspace{0.3cm}{\ttfamily [inline]}}



Emits a \doxylink{structRedrawEvent}{Redraw\+Event} for this component. 

\begin{DoxyWarning}{Warning}
This is only meant to be called from custom event handlers. Event handlers for events declared in {\ttfamily \doxylink{cydui__events_8h}{cydui\+\_\+events.\+h}} automatically trigger a redraw if {\ttfamily state-\/\texorpdfstring{$>$}{>}\doxylink{structcydui_1_1components_1_1component__state__t_a6e52ed7487c61640ad4a8edd0689906f}{mark\+\_\+dirty()}} gets called. Use that instead. 
\end{DoxyWarning}


Definition at line \mbox{\hyperlink{component_8h_source_l00069}{69}} of file \mbox{\hyperlink{component_8h_source}{component.\+h}}.

\Hypertarget{structcydui_1_1components_1_1component__state__t_a6e52ed7487c61640ad4a8edd0689906f}\label{structcydui_1_1components_1_1component__state__t_a6e52ed7487c61640ad4a8edd0689906f} 
\index{cydui::components::component\_state\_t@{cydui::components::component\_state\_t}!mark\_dirty@{mark\_dirty}}
\index{mark\_dirty@{mark\_dirty}!cydui::components::component\_state\_t@{cydui::components::component\_state\_t}}
\doxysubsubsection{\texorpdfstring{mark\_dirty()}{mark\_dirty()}}
{\footnotesize\ttfamily void cydui\+::components\+::component\+\_\+state\+\_\+t\+::mark\+\_\+dirty (\begin{DoxyParamCaption}{ }\end{DoxyParamCaption})\hspace{0.3cm}{\ttfamily [inline]}}



Marks this component state as needing to be redrawn. 

Events declared in {\ttfamily \doxylink{cydui__events_8h}{cydui\+\_\+events.\+h}} are dispatched automatically by the layout, which then checks for any {\ttfamily dirty} components that need redrawing.

It is due diligence of the component developer to appropriately mark the component as dirty when appropriate. As a baseline, any mutation to the state of a component should mark it dirty if said mutation affects how the component, or its children, are rendered. 

Definition at line \mbox{\hyperlink{component_8h_source_l00050}{50}} of file \mbox{\hyperlink{component_8h_source}{component.\+h}}.
